title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Dr. <!--more--> Judy Wood is a former professor at Clemson University’s Department of Mechanical Engineering, specializing in the research of thermal stress and deformation analysis with optical imaging, biomaterial composition, and biomimicry.
She is an expert in the field of interferometry, an optical method of stress analysis to determine interference patterns and their effects.
She has authored over 60 peer reviewed research papers.
Dr Wood has applied her scientific expertise, since the time of 911, to conduct what is probably the most thorough forensic study on the collapse of the world trade towers – based on over 40,000 images, video clips, volumes of witness testimonies.
Her findings led her to file a federal qui tam case for science fraud against the contractors who controlled the official 911 Commission report.
Her research has been published in a 500 page book, “Where Did the Towers Go?: Evidence of Directed Free-Energy Technology on 911.”
